sentences.cn: " 她认识你却不向你鞠躬.

sentences.en: An'Ah wuz so sceered Ah din'know whut ter do!
sentences.cn: 我吓坏了,不知怎么办才好.

sentences.en: Huccome you din'ast dem ter stay fer supper, Miss Scarlett?
sentences.cn: 你怎么没留他们吃晚饭呀, 思嘉小姐?

sentences.en: Naturally, it couldn't be the thunderous din of mosquitoes.
Once the teacher left the room , the chatter in the classroom gradually rose to a din.
sentences.cn: 老师一离开教室, 喋喋不休声就变为吵闹声.

sentences.en: Sam scratched his woolly head . " Ah did -- an'Ah din't.
The bustle and din gradually faded to silence as night advanced.
sentences.cn: 随着夜越来越深,喧闹声逐渐沉寂.

sentences.en: The captain's voice was heard above the din.
sentences.cn: 透过一片嘈杂声听到了船长的说话声.

sentences.en: The children were making an awful din.
The din from the crowd outside was deafening.
sentences.cn: 外边是震天动地的喊声.

sentences.en: The whole lobby was a perfect pandemonium, and the din was terrific.
sentences.cn: 整个门厅一片嘈杂, 而且喧嚣刺耳.

sentences.en: They tried to make themselves heard over the din of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他们力图让自己的声音盖过人群的喧闹声。

sentences.en: This din lasted till after supper.
sentences.cn: 这样闹哄,一直到大家都吃过饭.

sentences.en: We expect the din of the cloud-related chatter to turn into a real roar by this time next year.
sentences.cn: 我们期望云相关的喋喋不休的喧闹在明年的这个时候变成真正的咆哮。

phrases.tran_cn: 符合德国工业标准的导轨

trans.tran_en: a loud unpleasant noise that continues for a long time
